p.s: You 've been on the net for years .
Yet , almost nobody knows about your web presence .
You just want to be well known and you want people to talk about your online prowess and exploits .
To become popular on the internet is possible , it 'll just require a bit more effort beyond what you 're doing normally .

item.s: Understand why do you want to get popular .
Be absolutely certain that you want to be a popular online presence .
With popularity comes loss of peace , the inability to move around quietly and a need to maintain a great reputation in your chosen field of popularity .
This can add up to a lot of effort , especially if you 're not being paid for it and have to keep that day job up .
It can also erode your humility and cause you to behave in ways that are n't entirely you and can lead to dissatisfaction .
If you 're okay with this , proceed with the next steps .

figure.rend: Get Popular on the Internet Step 1.jpg

item.s: Join plenty of social networking sites .
Start with the well known ones , such as Twitter , Facebook and the like .

Then tailor your online presence to the area for which you 're keen to be known , such as graphic design , scene fashion , smoothies-maker extraordinaire , medical explanations guru , or whatever it is .
Find a blog , website , portal , forum , etc. , where you can make the most of your talents and start creating your presence there through adding information , interacting and being around a lot .

head.s: Being the Kind of Person Others Love to Connect With

item.s: Be unique .
If you 're copying everyone else , there is a good chance that you 're not going to be seen or heard about .
Few people are keen to see the same , same .
Thus , think of a new trend , or try something that nobody has done before , even if it 's a common topic done very differently .
Be nice .
And be genuinely nice , not just putting on an act .

figure.rend: Get Popular on the Internet Step 5.jpg

item.s: If you want to be known as grumpy and gruff , do n't chop and change by pretending to be nice one minute , then horrible the next .
Get your brand straight .

forums
.

item.s: Be aware that this is likely to chew up your time considerably .
Be careful what discussions you get involved in ; keep it light , friendly and caring .
Add friends .
When you 're on social websites , add many friends .
Have a big list of them !
Because the friends of your friends will start adding you , and you 'll get more and more well known .

figure.rend: Get Popular on the Internet Step 7.jpg

item.s: Provide valuable updates , insights and information .
People are thirsty for good content , not self-love .
Give them something they 're keen to watch , read or listen to .
Introduce them to interesting things on a regular basis .
Bring together the energies of other people whose work and updates add value to yours , so that you spread around support for others online .
For to be-popular internet celebs , get someone to take pictures of you .
And sometimes , you will have to photo shop your pics ( read the tip above ) .

For to be-popular graphic designers , get a good editing program like
Adobe Photoshop .
Do you know how the graphic designer Nineland got popular ?
She worked as a graphic designer for a site called Miss Bimbo .
Plan on stuff !

For example " Today , I 'm
joining Myspace
and I 'm going to add 10 friends " .
Do n't give up .
You will never become popular on the internet just in a week .
For some , it takes six months , for others it takes longer .
Do n't let popularity spoil you .
If you 're popular , it does n't mean that you 're any better than your ( internet ) friends .
Respect everyone .
Do n't get into fights .
This might make people dislike you .
And your popularity might move down/ become lower .
Popularity dies easily .
It 's okay to be away from the internet for a week , two weeks .
But when you reach five months , do n't be surprised if someone has taken your place .
This is how it is , people love novelty and fresh faces .
Becoming popular is easy but keeping it is hard at the same time .
